name: Danava/Uncle Acid 7" Split (Kemado Records) SOLD OUT
description:
Side A:
White Nights Of Murder-Danava

Side B:
I'll Cut You Down- Uncle Acid And The Deadbeats

Ltd 7" from KEMADO Records. We have some copies for sale here and the mighty DANAVA will be selling copies at their European shows. Get one while you can...once these are gone they shalt never return!

name: Uncle Acid And The Deadbeats- Blood Lust (ltd edition) SOLD OUT!!
description:
70's Lo-fi witchy horror album starring Uncle Acid, Kat and Red. 

Plot:
One mans lust for women's blood turns into a drug orgy of torture, magick and MURDER. Critics have described the work as "Vile, hateful trash". File under B MOVIE, BETAMAX HORROR, LOW BUDGET, SEXPLOITATION, DOLLAR THEATER etc.

The songs on this audio recording disc are as follows:

1. I'll Cut You Down
2. Death's Door
3. Over And Over Again
4. Curse In The Trees
5. I'm Here To Kill You
6. 13 Candles
7. Ritual Knife
8. Withered Hand Of Evil

+ 1 bonus track.

Each cd is fresh out of the slaughter house and is laid to rest in a hand numbered, card sleeve containing lyric booklet. You shall also receive a delightful note from your Uncle Acid thanking you for your wise purchase! 

Yours for just 7.47 ("going into the night")!!!
